web-development.name: TheFurnitureBros API documentation
web-development.description: Wrote the API documentation for The Furniture Bros web application. The docs was written with the code for the API, compiled using JSDocs, and is displayed in the SwaggerUI using Express JS. The API docs follow the OpenAPI 3.0 specification.

web-development.name: Contact app

web-development.name: Resume site
web-development.techUsed: React.js, Git, Figma, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Animate, Router-dom, Canva
web-development.description: Created a responsive resume site (this site) using React.js. The source code is in GitHub. Design was made using Figma, following the common UI/UX design patterns. Stored written content in JSON format to mimic NoSQL database. Also followed SEO best practices (e.g using keywords, next-gen images)

web-development.name: Interactive Image Gallery
